CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Share Content stage positioned above or below the Content Creation or Upload stage?
SRP.A: The Share Content stage is positioned {above} the Content Creation or Upload stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Join Group or Community?
VE.A: The value of stage Join Group or Community is {56}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {283}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Share Content, with a value of {283}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Content Creation or Upload, with a value of {49}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {67} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 52? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Share Content} stage has {283}, the {Follow Account} stage has {123}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {56}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 89? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {56}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {49}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 52 and 203? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Follow Account} stage has {123}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {56}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to stage {Follow Account} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Share Content} and {Follow Account} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Join Group or Community} and {Content Creation or Upload} stages.
